title: S13 Ep39: The Art of Dying
itunes:title: The Art of Dying
description:
Rebecca Burg joins Darkness Radio to talk about a life on this side f the veil which involves being abused by an alcoholic father and facing terminal cancer, and on the other side of the veil involved learning ancient Siberian native traditions, taking soul walks and drawing spirit art. Rebecca set out to write a memoir that she could leave behind that teach people how to conquer fear and find our inner strength, but ends up bringing much more to today's program!

https://rebeccaburgart.com/

Get the book here: www.Amazon.com/shop/darknessradio

www.truecar.com
